articles.title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the U.S.
articles.summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the U.S.
articles.translated_summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.

articles.title: Elon Musk: I'm Suing Apple
articles.summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla, and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in...

articles.title: India Tycoon Partners US Firm on $2 AI Email Rival to Outlook
articles.summary: Indian tech entrepreneur Bhavin Turakhia is partnering GoDaddy Inc. to offer his artificial intelligence-led email service ‚Äî Titan ‚Äî to tens of millions of new users in an enterprise market dominated by Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc.‚Äôs Google.

articles.title: CoreWeave Traders Emboldened by AI Spending Ahead of Earnings

articles.title: Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.summary: Elon Musk plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.

articles.title: Google Teams With NASA On AI 'Space Doctor' To Diagnose, Treat Astronauts On Moon, Mars Missions Where Real-Time Earth Contact Isn't Possible
articles.summary: Alphabet Inc. is collaborating with NASA to develop an artificial intelligence medical assistant designed to diagnose and treat astronauts.
articles.translated_title: Google Teams With NASA On AI 'Space Doctor' To Diagnose, Treat Astronauts On Moon, Mars Missions Where Real-Time Earth Contact Isn't Possible
articles.translated_summary: Alphabet Inc. is collaborating with NASA to develop an artificial intelligence medical assistant designed to diagnose and treat astronauts.

articles.title: Musk says xAI to take legal action against Apple over App Store rankings
articles.summary: Billionaire Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would take legal action against Apple , accusing the iPhone maker of breaching antitrust regulations in managing the App Store rankings.
articles.translated_title: Musk says xAI to take legal action against Apple over App Store rankings
articles.translated_summary: Billionaire Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would take legal action against Apple , accusing the iPhone maker of breaching antitrust regulations in managing the App Store rankings.
